origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'HousingFundAPI.extract_limit', 'description': 'This function provides the extraction limit for housing fund based on the member status and employment type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'memberStatus', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The status of the housing fund member, e.g., newGraduate, experiencedEmployee.'}, {'name': 'employmentType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The employment type of the member, e.g., fullTime, partTime.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'limit', 'description': 'The maximum amount that can be extracted from the housing fund.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 HousingFundAPI.extract_limit, 它的参数输入如下: 'memberStatus'是'newGraduate', 'employmentType'是'fullTime'.
